website_summaries.verdict: Great for residential use, this log splitter has a number of features to keep the user comfortable and safe.
pros: Splits logs up 20.5 inches long and 10 inches in diameter
Log tray keeps logs safely in place so they don't fall to the ground
Stand height means you don't have to bend or twist as you split
cons: The product is great, but some arrive marred because of poor packaging

customer_reviews.title: Superior to my 10 ton hand powered hydraulic splitter in ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with this log splitter. Superior to my 10 ton hand powered hydraulic splitter in every way . The standing working height and log tray take much of the back pain out of this job. Don't be afraid of the 5 ton capacity. I find that if I rotate a log that doesn't split just a little bit the second try will usually split most logs. I highly recommend this log splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Works well but will it last
customer_reviews.text: The spitter arrived and a box that was in very bad condition. The box is not strong enough for the product. Fortunately, the machine was not damaged. The touch-up paint was dry. After using maybe 10 times. There is a lot of paint chipped off the bottom leg plastic spacers on both sides are totally in pieces. The splitter has not been moved more than 4 feet after assembly and has remained in the stand-up position the entire time. The plastic has broken just from use. See pictures. I wonder what kind of shape it will be in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value for home use
customer_reviews.text: Downsides, hard to maneuver with wheels that seem too small for anything other than pavement, and a strange center of gravity. Also, too weak for harder wood, larger pieces and knots and crotches. However, for the money, and for residential use this is perfectly adequate. The value is great. I was able to split a lot of 5 month old poplar rounds that were bigger than 12" diameter with this. I would recommend only for home use. Pros would need a much bigger machine.
customer_reviews.author: PupTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 5 star because it splits logs better than I expected. Here in Wisconsin we have mostly hardwood. This worked very well on partially dry white ash which can be split by hand but it's difficult to do so.This handled even logs with large knots. The splitter came quickly after order. Like other reviewers said, the box was somewhat damaged in transit and the Styrofoam broken in many places. But no damage to splitter noted. It was a little challenging to fit the pieces together, but the instructions were good. Don't know how long it will last, but "out of the gate" I'm very happy with the value.
customer_reviews.author: WI Jim

customer_reviews.title: Huge Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched from using a wood stove to a propane stove, so use a lot less wood, and no longer needed a big, heavy duty wood splitter. We have an old house with fireplaces however, so need logs for occasional romantic fires :) This little splitter is VERY impressive! Splits bi logs like a pro. It packs a lot of power and finesse for the price and size. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Clu Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great for breaking down firewood. The wood delivered is always a bit bulky for the stove, so purchased this with high hopes. In short, it makes quick work of almost any split. Serious knots can be an issue and require a little thinking, but other than that this performs flawlessly. The really cool thing is that you can operate it indoors and STANDING. Stay out of the elements and save your back! Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Log Splitter for Us!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works better than we expected! We were splitting 10x15 oak logs cut in July, so they were not seasoned. Splitting was easy. Loading was easy. Love the 2 handed operation as a safety measure. Arrived ahead of schedule - always good! Easy to assemble the legs. The piston doesn't push the log all the way to the splitter head, so the last bit needs to be ripped apart by hand, but that's been no problem. The wheels need improvement - larger or inflatable would be good and we may try that. Highly recommend this YARDMAX YS0552 5 Ton Electric Log Splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Meredith- Orr

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine. Way better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. works perfectly. Does everything it says it will do. I even tried to split an 18' wide Hickory log. it wouldn't do it, then I cut a 1" deep slot on the end and this thing split the log the rest of the way. Love the stand. Wish it was about 3 inches higher, but works fine. I have split Hickory, red oak, cherry, locust, maple, and some ash. It doesn't miss a lick. No fumes, no gas, hardly any noise. I split all the wood in the picture in a couple of hours with a radio playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason in Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Husband requested a log splitter for Christmas. Not knowing anything about splitters. I was looking for electric and easy to maneuver. We like on a lake and a steep hill. He had no issues bringing it up and down the hill. Even our 12 year old grandson, with full supervision, was splitting the downed trees. Did not bog down with the larger logs. They had the yard cleaned up in an afternoon. The motor is strong and no need to stop and fill with gas. My husband had it all put together and using it within the hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t actually used it yet and will update once I do. I put it together in about a half hour. Was able to do it myself even though it is heavy by lying on its side and upside down to attach the base to the splitter. The box was pretty smashed by the time I got it. The bag that had the wheel c clamps was broken and I only found one of the clamps for holding the wheels on. But it went together very well. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: An awesome wood splitter!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this wood splitter for my cabin and I will tell you that it was a great decision. The splitter has no problem at all splitting hard wood, as I split about a quarter cord into small pieces for my wood stove. I can go on and on about how satisfied that I am, but will finish by saying if you are looking for a very good wood splitter for a great price then this is the one! 5 stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I was impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It appeared that the box had been dropped in transit as one of the wheels was dented. This is definitely a 2 person job to put together when one of the person's is a woman as this item is very heavy. Instructions were clear, it took about an hour to piece it together. Once together, it worked great! Even I can use it and it does a terrific job splitting the wood and lays it down on the table. No chasing the pieces! One of my neighbors wandered by and looked it over. He said that it is well made and splits the wood better than his more expensive device. It even comes with touch-up paint, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We got this wood splitter for the reviews and the price and it has lived up to the reviews and exceeded its value! Has split lots of trees for us, large pieces, hard wood, easy to use! It seems it is made to maneuver on a nice paved ground, which is unlikely to be where you are using it, is my only complaint, but for the price its worth a little extra effort pushing it to where you need.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1983

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE LOG SPLITTER...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT LITTLE LOG SPLITTER... JUST WHAT I NEEDED TO SAVE MY SHOULDER & BACK... I SHOULD HAVE PURCHASED THIS ALONG TIME AGO TOOK ME 10 MINUTES TO ASSEMBLE...I HAVE IT SET UP LOW FOR THE HEAVY LARGE ROUNDS I HAVE... WHEN I GET THEM ALL SPLIT DOWN SMALLER I WILL USE THE STAND FEATURE WHICH I THINK IS GREAT. I ALSO LIKE THAT IT HAS A LOG TRAY ANOTHER GREAT FEATURE...THIS IS A STRONG LITTLE MACHINE WHAT A GREAT VALUE FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: HANK

customer_reviews.title: Great log splitter for home use!
customer_reviews.text: Really solid construction. This thing is heavy! It could user some better wheels for moving through grass etc. Other than that, it is strong, and does the job well. I have some large logs that need to be split. Bigger than the 10 inches recommended and it splits them with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Innuendo

customer_reviews.title: does a great job
customer_reviews.text: It is worth the money and it has a naturally learning curve. Some part of the instructions (the large plate that holds the wood after split) are a bit mysterious but you will figure it out fairly quickly. Good quality and good structure. Note that it not mean to work vertically, besides that it's a wonderful product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Esposito Mario

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had This Years Ago
customer_reviews.text: Splitting wood with a maul can be exercise but it's still dangerous. This splitter takes most of the danger out and makes the job almost pleasant. Although I'm splitting logs 6" to 8", the splitter does it effortlessly. So far it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jimme

customer_reviews.title: I thought the first one was fairly good and would have rated it 4-Stars
customer_reviews.text: This s the 2nd electric log splitter I have owned. I thought the first one was fairly good and would have rated it 4-Stars, maybe. Now that I have used the YardMax, I see it is far superior to the first splitter and my rating of the first drops significantly. The facts that it is up at waist level on it's own stand plus it has the tray at the end are huge pluses. I obtained my YardMax just after Hurricane Irma. As a result of Irma, I had plenty of oak & hickory cut and the YardMax went through the green wood with hardly any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peezy
customer_reviews.text: This log splitter is a great value. It was easy to put together. Two handed operation makes it safe but also slows you down a little. It's built tough, hars lots of splitting power, and is designed to move around easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This splitter is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in ripped box, but all parts present. Easy to assemble, washers are contoured to the round legs. Very study, and perfect waist height, does not kill your back. This splitter is powerful, no problem with heavy oak and other hardwood logs. A very safe machine with the operator out of harms way and both hands dedicated to operations. One person can easily use this without any help, I highly recommend this splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mc

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: I sent pictures of bad part. They sent a new part. The parts manual is incorrect and I received the wrong part. I sent them a description of the problem with their parts manual. Gave them the part number I thought I needed. Sent another part that has nothing to do with the problem. Two years later I still don't have it straightened our. Even with a picture. I like the product, but I still can't bolt it together, so it falls apart when I move it.
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I bought the splitter to use for re-splitting larger pieces and split 16" diameter rounds. I have split about 2 chords without a problem, I got maxed out on 2 pieces, but I was pushing the machine just to see if I could. If you want a splitter that you do not have to feed gas and oil and will work as a homeowner's assistant this is the splitter that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Wow. What a great splitter
customer_reviews.text: This is a real back saver. No maul wielding, no bending over to position logs. Works great on most of the logs that I need to split for my fire pit. I actually enjoy the job of splitting wood now.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bupp

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected from watching the video. Not too loud. My 9yo runs it for me. Good safety features. I only wish it pushed the logs a little farther. Easy to move around. So much better than using an ax!
customer_reviews.author: Shaken Ink

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I waited so long....
customer_reviews.text: This is my second piece of Yardmax equipment and I really am impressed with the quality. Firstly as many other reviewers have stated the box was pretty mangled when it arrived, in fairness it's a 100lbs and a pretty unbalanced load. All the pieces were undamaged and assembly was a snap 20 minutes later I was splitting 10" rounds of black walnut with no trouble. I highly recommend this product, do yourself and your back a favor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Not hard to assemble, but the box arrived somewhat damaged and we are missing some hardware. This thing works like a champ for hours. This was my first time using any type of wood splitter and I found it easy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Northrop

customer_reviews.title: Save your back and time with yardmax 5 ton electric log splitter
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the straight forward and direct instructions. Although the inside styrofoam was mangled my splitter was in perfect condition. It took about half of an hour to assemble, all the parts were clearly marked. I Was very happy with the quality build. The next day I bought the recommended extension cord, unscrewed the bleed screw and split 8 logs in about ten minutes. No problems what so ever sturdy quiet and easy my wife enjoyed using it as well. Thank you yardmax !
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Siringo

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Only thing that's going to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Only thing that's going to be a problem will be the plastic wheels. They won't take the weight of the machine over a lo g period of time. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: ron wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Works great beats the axe.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great price on here when I bought it. Has so far worked great and splits almost anything I have put on it. Sure better than swing the axe. I like the fact it stands up and is not on ground too.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Remington

customer_reviews.title: "Check fluid" Was not up to level when i got.
customer_reviews.text: Got and checked fluid it was at very bottom of stick. Had to go to Home d and get more was afraid to use. Once filling worked good. Called customer service at yardmax lady told me to get more fluid. NO HELP. They could have offered me a hat at least. All and All seems to be a good log Splitter.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter but poor shipping packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, powerful splitter. But the shipping box was damaged that I have missing parts and am unable to attach the wheels as a result. I would not have this item shipped again and cannot recommend it because of that.
customer_reviews.author: bpm3

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box was handling oak logs without breathing hard! I'd used a different model years ago and knew it'd do what I needed but the addition of a raised mount makes a huge difference. Features like a ram adjustment makes shorter logs quick and the tray, which I didn't have high hopes for, actually works great!
customer_reviews.author: David Fiola

customer_reviews.title: great little splitter
customer_reviews.text: works awesome, I wish the ram came slose to the wedge and the maching was easier to move around. Overall it goes a great job.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Grate Product
customer_reviews.text: Split a little over a cord so far. Goes through ash and birch with no problem. Perfect for splitting wood to burn in fire pits, wood burners, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lynn Sekelik

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Splits wood quickly and extremely easy to use. Love the fact that is on a stand and that it is easily movable.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great product, company will take care of you
customer_reviews.text: This is a little workhorse. Easy to operate and having it raised up is great for minimixing back strain. After a year of use and splitting 8.5 full cords, my item suddenly stopped powering up. It was under warranty and customer service went above and beyond to help. Great product,
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Splitter!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to assemble, price point is extremely affordable. Great little splitter! I've used this to split one cord of wood so far with no issues or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I cold not be more pleased. Works well from within our basement to split ...
customer_reviews.text: I cold not be more pleased. Works well from within our basement to split the larger logs that will not fit within our wood stove. Also used it to split a half cord of wood from a male tree that fell recently. The splitter has plenty of power and is very easy to move!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Ok little machine
customer_reviews.text: Works ok on smaller stuff but some people’s reviews said it could handle big stuff but not for me only up to 7 in season pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put it together, split 2 cords, then several ...
customer_reviews.text: Put it together, split 2 cords, then several more pieces for kindling. Hardwoods, softwood, not a single issue. Had a struggle with some knotty old stuff, but repositioned and kept working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my husband. He wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He wasn't sure how it was going to work being electric but he loves it and has handled every job!
customer_reviews.author: S. Seewald

customer_reviews.title: Does as advertised and simple operation
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how well built this wood splitter was. It took approximately 30 to 45 minutes to get it fully assembled. Need at least 2 people for assembly. It does as advertised, the best purchase I’ve had in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Frye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for splitting kindling
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect log splitter for making kindling, but can handle much more. Fits in the garage and no fumes or noise. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: If you can find a pre assembled unit buy it even if it costs more.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It was very hard to assemble. Several of the holes for bolts didn’t line up. It requires metric tools, why not supply them? This is my second wood splitter and I hope it works as well as the first (lasted 12 years)
customer_reviews.author: Bill Smith Studio Inc

customer_reviews.title: Great Splitter
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressed so far. Fairly easy assembly, no big issues noticed. Split a few maple logs after i finished putting it together and it went through them with no problems at all. As of now id very much recommend this log splitter
customer_reviews.author: Dave Moore

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. It easily split any log that fit on the machine. In one afternoon I split oak logs that stacked four foot wide by four foot high, two rows deep.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Richter

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, firewood for the house is now the right size and burns better. It did have a couple of paint chips and having to use two hands just slows it down a little
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Raised legs make it easier to split wood from a standing position
customer_reviews.text: A great electric wood splitter at a very competitive price. Listed at Amazon below competitor suppliers. Easy assembly. Easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B

customer_reviews.title: I like the stand and
customer_reviews.text: I have been splitting madrone which is very hard to split. It is getting the job done. I like the stand and tray
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: A few of the holes don't match up for the bolts but that's cool, and it won't go through some of the pecan I have. But other than that it's pretty great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton G Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Wood splitter
customer_reviews.text: Great job for a small wood splitter. I like it to because it's quit.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Works great! - Easy to assemble - The stand is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! - Easy to assemble - The stand is a lot more heavy duty than the picture can portray.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Powers thru logs easily. Great for firewood. Easily did a cord in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Birchem

customer_reviews.title: This splitter really works great. I'm splitting medium size logs for my BBQ ...
customer_reviews.text: This splitter really works great. I'm splitting medium size logs for my BBQ smoker. It has done the job without any problem. It's actually fun.😆
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for taking logs, split for firewood and turning it into kindling...fantastic for the homeowner.
customer_reviews.author: SOS

customer_reviews.title: missing 2nd pkg. of scews, could not finish assemble
customer_reviews.text: product good but did not have all parts with it, could not put on wheels, missing wheel assembly scews
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: the stand was abit of a promblem but its all good.
customer_reviews.text: I love my wood splitter the yardmax was my top choice among many splitters thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ribb man

customer_reviews.title: This splitter is perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: This splitter is great if you can get logs easily and just need them split for a fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Great electric splitter!
customer_reviews.text: Great little splitter. Easy to use and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter for confined space
customer_reviews.text: Great splitter for confined space, can use in the basement of a home for splitting kindle wood. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The Splitter was simple to put together works well and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Cus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the two switches' ensure safety and it work great on the size wood I use
customer_reviews.author: Paw

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, no manual
customer_reviews.text: Package delivered quickly, seems to work as described. However box was damaged and open at top - no instructions or set up which caused me xtra time to get up and running
customer_reviews.author: john h hirsch

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Father in law. He seems to like it
customer_reviews.author: ALLEN SULTON

customer_reviews.title: Great log splitter
customer_reviews.text: Works well on Pine, Mesquite & Pecan. Looking forward on trying it on some oak. Fights around the knots a bit. Also the tray lets go sometimes. Wish it attached with bolts and had less give. All around easy to assemble and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

product_meta.title: YARDMAX YS0552 5 Ton Electric Log Splitter, Stand, Log Tray
product_meta.description: The Yardmax 5 ton electric log splitter gives you the power to tackle tough challenges and make log splitting simple and efficient. High-powered, lightweight and easy to maneuver and operate, Yardmax log Splitters are built to maximize user experience and results. Yardmax electric log Splitters offer the strength, speed and durability of a high-end product at a far more reasonable price. Yardmax’s electric log Splitters provide the ruggedness needed to take on the job — with the ease, portability and convenience of clean, electric splitting.
feature_bullets: Powerful, 5 Ton RAM Force to get the job done fast
Stand, log tray and stroke limiter included
Two-handed operation puts operator safety first
Log capacity - 20.5" in length and 10" in diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
